SELECT employees.name, departments.department_name
FROM employees
INNER JOIN departments 
ON employees.dept_id = departments.dept_id;

-- AS ì‚¬ìš© (ê°„ê²°í•¨)
SELECT e.name, d.department_name
FROM employees AS e
INNER JOIN departments AS d
ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id;
